item.description: Brazillian Jiu Jitsu is widley considered the most practical martial art there is (you may have seen it on the UFC or cage fighting events) Mike and I would agree that after competing and training in BJJ for 5+ years, it is the most practical and fun martial art out there (though we do also train in Judo, Boxing, Wrestling). We are holding a group lesson that will introduce you to BJJ/Grappling. Bring workout/gym attire, it will go for about 2 hours and is only $15.00. Feel free to message with any questions.

group.name: The Arlington Martial Arts Meetup Group

item.name: Brazillian Jiu-Jitsu\\/Self Defense Group Lesson
